Headline: #63 63rd Temporary Westbound Reroute near 63rd/Sacramento
ShortDescription: WB 63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #63 63rd buses are temporarily rerouted via 63rd, California, 59th, Kedzie and 63rd due to street blockage near 63rd/Sacramento.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays & congestion following an earlier mechanical problem Belmont. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem Belmont. 

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
